languages.text: Тем временем подбитый корабль ксеносов стремительно удаляется от места недавней бойни, стараясь скрыться в тени ближайшего мира. Любые попытки связаться с ним терпят провал, и Мастер вокса докладывает, что судно в плачевном состоянии — кто знает, сколько еще смогут выдержать технологии ксеносов, прежде чем случится непоправимое.

Meanwhile, the wounded xenoship is rapidly distancing itself from the recent battlefield, attempting to hide in the shadow of the nearest world. Every attempt to contact it is met with frustration, and the Vox Master reports that the vessel is in deplorable condition — who knows how much more the xenotechnology can endure before the irreparable happens.
languages.original_text: Тем временем подбитый корабль ксеносов стремительно удаляется от места недавней бойни, стараясь скрыться в тени ближайшего мира. Любые попытки связаться с ним терпят провал, и Мастер вокса докладывает, что судно в плачевном состоянии — кто знает, сколько еще смогут выдержать технологии ксеносов, прежде чем случится непоправимое.

traits.locale_text: Meanwhile, the wounded xenoship is rapidly distancing itself from the recent battlefield, attempting to hide in the shadow of the nearest world. Every attempt to contact it is met with frustration, and the Vox Master reports that the vessel is in deplorable condition — who knows how much more the xenotechnology can endure before the irreparable happens.

Every attempt to contact it is met with frustration, and the Vox Master reports that the vessel is in deplorable condition — who knows how much more the xenotechnology can endure before the irreparable happens.

Every attempt to contact it is met with frustration, and the Vox Master reports that the vessel is in deplorable condition — who knows how much more the xenotechnology can endure before the irreparable happens.

Meanwhile, the wounded xenoship is rapidly distancing itself from the recent battlefield, attempting to hide in the shadow of the nearest world. Every attempt to contact it is met with frustration, and the Vox Master reports that the vessel is in deplorable condition — who knows how much more the xenotechnology can endure before the irreparable happens.

Meanwhile, the wounded xenoship is rapidly distancing itself from the recent battlefield, attempting to hide in the shadow of the nearest world. Every attempt to contact it is met with frustration, and the Vox Master reports that the vessel is in deplorable condition — who knows how much more the xenotechnology can endure before the irreparable happens.

languages.text: 与此同时，受损的异形飞船正在迅速逃离战场，试图藏在最近世界的阴影之中。音阵大师发送了很多次信息，但没有一次能联系到对方的舰船。音阵大师报告声称，那艘舰船的状况非常糟糕。没人知道在不可挽回的事情发生之前，那艘异形舰船还能支撑多久。
languages.original_text: Meanwhile, the wounded xenoship is rapidly distancing itself from the recent battlefield, attempting to hide in the shadow of the nearest world. Every attempt to contact it is met with frustration, and the Vox Master reports that the vessel is in deplorable condition — who knows how much more the xenotechnology can endure before the irreparable happens.

traits.locale_text: 与此同时，受损的异形飞船正在迅速逃离战场，试图藏在最近世界的阴影之中。音阵大师发送了很多次信息，但没有一次能联系到对方的舰船。音阵大师报告声称，那艘舰船的状况非常糟糕。没人知道在不可挽回的事情发生之前，那艘异形舰船还能支撑多久。

languages.text: 一方、傷ついた異種族船は戦場から素早く距離を取り、最も近い惑星の影に隠れようとしている。何度連絡を取ろうとしてたが、うまくいかない。ヴォクス・マスターによると、この船はかなりひどい状態だそうだ。修理不可能なほど取り返しのつかない状態にならずに済むかどうかは異星技術にかかっている。
languages.original_text: Meanwhile, the wounded xenoship is rapidly distancing itself from the recent battlefield, attempting to hide in the shadow of the nearest world. Every attempt to contact it is met with frustration, and the Vox Master reports that the vessel is in deplorable condition — who knows how much more the xenotechnology can endure before the irreparable happens.

traits.locale_text: 一方、傷ついた異種族船は戦場から素早く距離を取り、最も近い惑星の影に隠れようとしている。何度連絡を取ろうとしてたが、うまくいかない。ヴォクス・マスターによると、この船はかなりひどい状態だそうだ。修理不可能なほど取り返しのつかない状態にならずに済むかどうかは異星技術にかかっている。

languages.text: Mientras tanto, la nave xenos dañada se aleja rápidamente del campo de batalla, intentando ocultarse a la sombra del mundo más cercano. Cada intento de contactar con ella se topa con la frustración, y la maestra de vocos informa de que la nave se encuentra en un estado lamentable. Quién sabe cuánto más podrá aguantar la xenotecnología antes de que ocurra lo inevitable.
languages.original_text: Meanwhile, the wounded xenoship is rapidly distancing itself from the recent battlefield, attempting to hide in the shadow of the nearest world. Every attempt to contact it is met with frustration, and the Vox Master reports that the vessel is in deplorable condition — who knows how much more the xenotechnology can endure before the irreparable happens.

traits.locale_text: Mientras tanto, la nave xenos dañada se aleja rápidamente del campo de batalla, intentando ocultarse a la sombra del mundo más cercano. Cada intento de contactar con ella se topa con la frustración, y la maestra de vocos informa de que la nave se encuentra en un estado lamentable. Quién sabe cuánto más podrá aguantar la xenotecnología antes de que ocurra lo inevitable.{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}{/g}

languages.text: Das verwundete Xenoschiff entfernt sich unterdessen rasant von dem Schlachtfeld und versucht, sich im Schatten der nächstgelegenen Welt zu verstecken. Alle Bemühungen, es zu kontaktieren, scheitern. Die Voxmeisterin berichtet, dass das Schiff in miserablem Zustand ist. Wer weiß, wie viel die Xenotechnologie noch aushalten kann, ehe sie nicht mehr reparieren zu ist.
languages.original_text: Meanwhile, the wounded xenoship is rapidly distancing itself from the recent battlefield, attempting to hide in the shadow of the nearest world. Every attempt to contact it is met with frustration, and the Vox Master reports that the vessel is in deplorable condition — who knows how much more the xenotechnology can endure before the irreparable happens.

traits.locale_text: Das verwundete Xenoschiff entfernt sich unterdessen rasant von dem Schlachtfeld und versucht, sich im Schatten der nächstgelegenen Welt zu verstecken. Alle Bemühungen, es zu kontaktieren, scheitern. Die Voxmeisterin berichtet, dass das Schiff in miserablem Zustand ist. Wer weiß, wie viel die Xenotechnologie noch aushalten kann, ehe sie nicht mehr reparieren ist.

languages.text: Pendant ce temps, le vaisseau xénos endommagé prend rapidement ses distances avec le champ de bataille et cherche à se cacher dans l'ombre du monde le plus proche. Toutes les tentatives pour établir le contact restent vaines, et la maîtresse-vox vous informe que le bâtiment est dans un état déplorable. Ce n'est qu'une question de temps avant que la xénotechnologie embarquée finisse par lâcher et que l'irréparable se produise.
languages.original_text: Meanwhile, the wounded xenoship is rapidly distancing itself from the recent battlefield, attempting to hide in the shadow of the nearest world. Every attempt to contact it is met with frustration, and the Vox Master reports that the vessel is in deplorable condition — who knows how much more the xenotechnology can endure before the irreparable happens.
